title: FS: T206 Frank Smith (Chicago & Bost.) Piedmont 42, SGC 55!
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Frank Smith (Chicago & Bost.) Piedmont 42, SGC 55!
posts.post_content: An SGC 30 just sold two nights ago for around $900. This card is much sharper, not even close,  $1295 delivered. Please send me your email for pics, thanks....

Actually, I won it for $600 ($720 w/BP).  

Good luck with your card!
